original_text: Babylon's soldiers took hold of King Zedekiah. They took him to King Nebuchadnezzar at Riblah. Nebuchadnezzar decided how to punish Zedekiah.
korean_text: 그들이 왕을 사로잡아 그를 립나에 있는 바벨론 왕에게로 끌고 가매 그들이 그를 심문하니라

sentences.original_text: Babylon's soldiers took hold of King Zedekiah.
They took him to King Nebuchadnezzar at Riblah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 립라에서 느부갓네살 왕에게 데려갔다.

sentences.original_text: Nebuchadnezzar decided how to punish Zedekiah.
